title: Simple Steps to Learn Avada Kedavra in Hogwarts Legacy

steps.title: Respond with, "Everyone should know that curse."
steps.content: Respond with, "Everyone should know that curse." You'll go through a cave with Sebastian Swallows on his quest called "In the Shadow of the Relic," and he'll talk about the killing curse. [1] X Research source You need to have completed the relationship quest, "In the Shadow of Hope," and the main story quest, "Lodgok's Loyalty." [2] X Research source

steps.title: Say, "Yes, please."
steps.content: Say, "Yes, please." Sebastian will teach you the most unforgivable of curses, Avada Kedavra. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Return to the Undercroft.
steps.content: Return to the Undercroft. As long as you haven't snitched on Sebastian, he will still be in his lair and willing to teach you Avada Kedavra. So when you're doing the quest, "In the Shadow of Fate," make sure to choose "We must not turn Sebastian in" when you're talking to Ominis Gaunt. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Talk to Sebastian.
steps.content: Talk to Sebastian. You'll be able to learn all the unforgivable curses from him that you don't have, including Avada Kedavra. If you said no earlier and then snitched on him, Sebastian won't be able to teach you Avada Kedavra.

steps.title: None.
steps.content: None. Hogwarts Legacy doesn't use a morality system, so you aren't going to turn evil simply by using the unforgivable curse. Your relationships and story will remain unaffected by your use of Avada Kedavra. [5] X Research source Certain companions, however, don't like when you use the curse.
